member.name: TYPEDESC
member.summary: Describes the type of a variable, the return type of a function, or the type of a function parameter.

member.name: TYPEDESC.DUMMYUNIONNAME.lptdesc
member.summary: With VT_PTR, the type pointed to.

member.name: TYPEDESC.DUMMYUNIONNAME.hreftype
member.summary: With VT_USER_DEFINED, this is used to get a TypeInfo for the UDT.
